data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cao, Cheng-Quan, Shi, Jian-Ping, Yin, Zhan (2016): Discovery of a new species and key to all known species of the genus Aalatettix Zheng & Mao (Orthoptera, Tetrigoidea, Tetrigidae) from China. Zootaxa 4097 (1): 143-146, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4097.1.12
